alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Knott (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Knott and southwestern Floyd Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 216 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Handshoe, or 10 miles northeast of Hindman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mousie around 220 PM EDT. Betty, Porter Junction, Garret and Bosco around 225 PM EDT. Estill, Wayland, Glo and Raven around 230 PM EDT. Minnie, Drift and Demo around 235 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include East McDowell, McDowell, Orkney and Price. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
